casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

September, 2011

(September 9, 2011) In the Matter of Charles Burkwit, Appellant, v New York State Board of Elections, Respondent, and Wayne County Board of Elections et al., Respondents. [929 NYS2d 786]

It is hereby ordered that the order and judgment so appealed from is unanimously affirmed without costs. Present — Centra, J.E, Fahey, Green and Gorski, JJ.
